content.rendered:
Directed by Anees Bazmee

Written by Anees Bazmee. Deepak Kingrani. Shreya Dev Verma

Cast Anil Kapoor (Wifi Bhai). John Abraham (Raj Kishore). Ileana D’Cruz (Sanjana). Arshad Warsi (Junky). Pulkit Samrat (Chandu). Urvashi Rautela (Kavya). Kriti Kharbanda (Jhanvi). Saurabh Shukla (Raja Sahab). Inaamulhaq (Niraj Modi). Zakir Hussain (Tulli Seth). Brijendra Kala (Mamaji). Ashok Samarth (Bulli Seth). Dolly Bindra (Raja Sahab’s Wife). Mohd Talib (Jamie-lee beacher friend (as mohd Talib)) . Yash Agnihotri (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Alister Albert (Rajasahab’s Bodyguard). Mizzy Ali (Lawnmower Chief). Neilesh Ambu (Chauffeur). Manoj Anand (Jhanvi’s Party Guest / Butler / Bodyguard). Simon Anthony (Passer by). Ian Archdeacon (Rajasahabs Bodyguard). Sagar Arya (Bank Manager). Mohd Aslam (Supporting Artist). Gabriel Athanasiou (Doctor). Raj Awasti (Market Shopper / Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Paolo Bafico (Arab Sheikh). Manoj Bakshi (Statue Man). Dev Barot (Bodyguard). Jamie-Lee Beacher (Clubber). Soo Bee (Market Shopper). Nicholas Benjamin (Ticket Seller). Leyton Benta (DJ). Kishore Bhatt (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Olivia Mae Bradley (Nirav Modi’s Body Guard). Henry Broom (Supporting Artist). Clifton Brown (Bodyguard 2). Dominic Canokema (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Paul Cavendish (Jhanvi’s Party Guest / Bodyguard). Sumit Chakravarti (Raj). Shahan Chaudhry (Chief). Danielle Clarke (Waitress / Jhanvi’s Party Guest). David Clement-Horton (Racecourse Attendee). Robin Coe (Nirav Modi’s Body Guard). Tiziana Coste (Market Shopper). Jordan Croysdale (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Garbriella Cuffy (Supporting Artist). Christian Di Sciullo (Bodyguard). Sergio Dondi (Police officer). Linda Dootson (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Charlotte Dunnico (Assassin). Daniel Eghan (Bodyguard). Mike Espezel (Hotel Receptionist / Racecourse Attendee). Nina Gabriela (Dancer). Nisha George (Mansion Maid). Sarah Greenwell (Market Shopper). Naman Gupta (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Antti Hakala (Patient). John Harpley (Waiter / Jhanvi’s Party Guest / Security Guard). Sammy Jonas Heaney (Addison / Doctor / Dancer (as Sammy John Heaney)). Debra Hensman (Cafe Diner). Mark Highfield (Butler). Alex Hill (Racecourse Attendee). Dani Hohen (Tum Par Hum Dancer). Ken Hough (VIP Guest). Ty Hurley (Fairground & Market Customer). Diana HÃ¼bel (Assassin’s Bodyguard). Joginder Singh Jagpal (Butler). Ian Jarvis (Raja Saheb Body Guard). Peter Jay (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Elle Jones (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Kelly Juvilee (Nurse). Madara Kanele (Maid). Vaunisha Kapoor (Market Shopper / Jhanvi’s Party Guest / Racecourse Attendee). Louise Kasozi (Market Shopper). Simran Kaur (Waitress). Ehsan Khan (Indian Police Inspector). Jameel Khan (Panditji). Nick Khan (Bodyguard). Nidhiy Kharkar (Truck Driver). Kinjal (Market Shopper). Clare Knapp (Market Shopper). Dimple Kumar (Market Shopper / Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Nina Kumar (Market Shopper / Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Richie Lawrie (Classy). Mariia Legun (Posh Party Guest). Dipali Limbachia (Market Shopper / Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Joe Maxwell (Raja Saheb Body Guard). Pete Meads (Party Guest). Frina Mehta (Market Shopper / Jhanvi’s Party Waitress / Racecourse Attendee). Rushabh Mehta (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Tannaz Mirdavoody (Tum Par Hum Dancer). Bharat Mistri (Butler). Iago Montgomery-Jarvis (Ian / Bodyguard). Seema Morar (Market Shopper). Jiten Mukhi (Mehul Chowksi). Yusof Mutahar (Businessman). Kuldeep N.(Market Shopper). Ivett Nanasi (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Johnny Neale (Doctor). Kwok Ng(Butler). Honey Nia (Bodyguard). Victor Nita (Bodyguard). Daniel Osgood (Bodyguard). Tina Louise Owens (Wedding Guest). Kanchan Pagare (Raja Sahab Driver & Bad News Guy). Lukas Parizek (Czech Birthday Guest). Dharmesh Parmer (Butler / Bodyguard). Asha Patel (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Jai Patel (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Steven Pereira (Dancer / Clubber). Cosmina Maria Popa (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Lote Pupola (Patients Wife). Sneya Rajani (Dancer). Leej Ramirez (Dancer). Luke Thomas C. Riley (Mansion Staff / Body Guard). John Alan Roberts (Wedding guest). Isabella Rosinante (Jhanvi’s BFF). Narinder Sangha (Racing Tipster). Anna Satchit (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Neharika Shahi (Jhanvi’s Party Waitress). Atul Sharma (House keeper / Jhanvi’s Party Guest / Racecourse Attendee). Gaurav Sharma (Jhanvi’s Party Guest / Delievery Worker). Vinita Sharma (Jhanvi’s Party Guest / Racecource Attandee). Joanna Shegera (Assassin’s Bodyguard).Chobber Sidhu. Sonal Simon (Friend). Shanelle Sin (Jhanvi’s Party Guest). Vickrem Singh (Passerby (as Vickrem Gill)). Jeff Slater (Bodyguard / Waiter). Amanda Smith (Supporting Artiste). Adris Tariq (Adris). Mukesh Tiwari (Baba Jani). Danny Trappit (Market Shopper). Izem Ustun (Smoker’s girlfriend).Samantha Varley.Gillian Vassilliou.Ren Vassilliou.Daniela Villada LondoÃ±o.David Warren.Mark Jason Williams.Rina Yadav.Jason Yip.Nisha Zala.Yuvraj Zala.Huw Morgan.Peter Saracen.Naresh Sharma.Satish Sharma.Craig Shorrock.Suresh Sippy.Ramesh Vethanayagam.Winnie Wong.Clara Zoroddu

Languages Hindi

Producers Harish Amin. Surabhi Bhatnagar. Pearl Gill. Bhushan Kumar. Santosh K. Mishra. Abhishek Pathak. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Sudipto Sarkar. Pragya Singh

Production Panorama Studio. T-Series Film. T-Series
